alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sevier Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:16PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Millard and north central Sevier Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 215 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Salina, or 9 miles northeast of Richfield, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sigurd and Holden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 168 and 178. Interstate 70 between mile markers 45 and 50. US Route 50 between mile markers 117 and 119, and between mile markers 138 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sevier Valley
